line.text: Why didst thou promise such a beauteous day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And make me travel forth without my cloak
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To let base clouds oertake me in my way
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hiding thy bravry in their rotten smoke
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tis not enough that through the cloud thou break
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To dry the rain on my storm-beaten face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For no man well of such a salve can speak
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That heals the wound and cures not the disgrace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor can thy shame give physic to my grief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though thou repent yet I have still the loss
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Th offender sorrow lends but weak relief
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To him that bears the strong offence cross
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ah but those tears are pearl which thy love sheds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And they are rich and ransom all ill deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
